Queue Client for Kafka
======================

The `KafkaClient <#crawler.queue_handler.KafkaClient.KafkaClient>`_ class fully implements all the necessary functions required by the :ref:`Client Message Queue Interface <my-reference-label>`. It is then used to facilitate the communication with a Kafka message queue in order to receive new crawl jobs.
